ProblemStatement: Our Scrum team is struggling with inconsistent sprint velocity and unclear acceptance criteria. We need a structured way to improve backlog refinement and ensure user stories are properly defined before sprint planning.
ResponseText:
Summary
- Problem: inconsistent sprint velocity and unclear acceptance criteria
- Impact: unpredictable planning and rework

Recommended actions
1) Add Definition of Ready
2) Standardize acceptance criteria
3) Run weekly backlog refinement
